column1: #text=The other day , I finished reading the fourth book of the Game of Thrones Series .
#text=With the new season about to start on HBO , I wanted to get ahead of the show and continue reading the books in the series -- but I did not want to pay for the next book .
#text=Remembering that I had a library card somewhere in my desk at home , I went home and found it .
#text=I went to the library and after browsing the fiction section , I finally found the fifth book in the series and brought it to the check out desk of the library .
#text=I handed over my information and library card and checked out the book , getting two weeks to read it for free .
#text=I 'm now a quarter of the way through the book and enjoy every page of it while loving the fact that my taxes paid for me to read this and I had to pay no extra money .
